        DiePlacementMove's constructor
        Parameters:
        h - height of the placement
        w - width of the placement
        diePosition - position of the die inside teh reserve
        name - player name
        color - true if color restriction is to be used
        value - true if value restriction is to be used
        adjacent - true if adjacent restriction is to be used
